title: Seven Years War effects Native Americans

content.question: The conclusion of the Seven Yearsâ€™ War (French and Indian War) had which of the following effects on Native American societies?

choices.label: Native Americans allied with Great Britain gained the right to become British citizens, angering the colonists.
British and French officials agreed to force Native Americans to move to reservations west of the Mississippi River.
Native Americans gained control of all of the western fur trade with British colonists.
The British government attempted to restrict western settlement to reduce tensions between colonists and Native Americans.

content.answer: The British government attempted to restrict western settlement to reduce tensions between colonists and Native Americans.

topic.text: 3.2: Seven Years' War (The French and Indian War)
